message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.RO 

The paper deals with 3D human pose estimation using a siamese architecture that learns a rotation equivariant hidden representation. This involves computer vision (CV) techniques for detecting 2D positions and lifting them into 3D coordinates. The paper also proposes a novel approach to reduce the need for data augmentation, which involves machine learning (ML) techniques such as siamese networks and hidden representations. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Other likely sub-categories include cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.GR (Graphics), and cs.RO (Robotics).
